title: EmployeeRole
description: A subclass of OrganizationRole used to describe employee relationships.

baseSalary.description: The base salary of the job or of an employee in an EmployeeRole.

salaryCurrency.description: The currency (coded using [ISO 4217](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217)) used for the main salary information in this job posting or for this employee.
